Parameter.Description: Left to right (0), right to left (1), bottom to top (2), top to bottom (3)

Parameter.Description: Invert Back/Foreground colors for current state.

Parameter.Description: Value between Minimum and Maximum, default 0

Border Type
Parameter.Description: Left (0), Centre (1), Right (2), DP (3), Bottom (4), Top (5)

Parameter.Description: Should invert color when button pressed

Parameter.Description: Invert Back/Foreground colors for current state.

Parameter.Description: Indicator Border Width (when no fill color is used)

Parameter.Description: Indicator Border Width (when no fill color is used)

Parameter.Name: DisplayFormat
Parameter.Description: DDD MM' SS.S" (0), DDD MM.MMM' (1), DDD.DDDDD (2)
